name: noidedfish2
dialogue: You see a fish around here that kinda looks like me only a lot rounder?
Yeah, steer clear of that fella. Not a great guy.
Don't believe a word he says. He's trying to pull some scam or something.
He's a liar, a cheat, and he's personally slighted me on several occasions.
Just in case you happen to come across him. You look like a standup guy, so I wouldn't want you to get in trouble, y'hear?
